channel.title: Help me please, how do i play on other peoples servers?
channel.description:
I am Very New here. I downloaded my mopar. and its very laggy
like most noted items when i put in bank turn into obby mauls and i cant drop or pur them in bank. i have to sell to a gen store
all my weapons attack the same way
i cant use range/ mage attacks
and i cant do most stats like thieving and stuff
and my jaw is missing
so i think its better to just join another players game
So how do i join another players server?
